modName: Revert Necromage Change in Unofficial Skyrim Patch
summary: This reverts the change on the Necromage perk in the Unofficial Skyrim Patch.
descriptionHtml:
This reverts the change on the Necromage perk in the Unofficial Skyrim Patch so that your enchanted items receive the 25% bonus if you are a vampire.  There is another mod that does the exact same thing on here but I had issues downloading it so I made my own.Make sure to put this one after the Unofficial Patch in the load order.  Message me if there are any issues.

Here is a link to the other mod that does this fix http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28781
Here is a link to the Unofficial Skyrim Patch http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19
author: Ninja117
